Detailed Description

This struct defines the parameters for random correction
Parameters:
enable if the random correction needed
tau timing window (nsec)
averagingInterval time (sec) to average singles data
deadTimeCorrection if the dead time correction needed, 1 yes, 0 no
singlesScaleFactor as defined
verbosity level of output
